website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, this small but powerful machine is worth considering for anyone who needs a grout steamer that is light in weight and low in price.
pros: Inexpensive steamer that comes with nine accessories that are useful for various tasks
Lightweight, portable, and easy to handle
cons: A few of the attachments are hard to get on and off the steamer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous item!
customer_reviews.text: I have cleaned my car twice with this steam cleaner. No harsh chemical smell and had a deep enough cleaning under my satisfaction, especially the fast heating inner core heats water in leads than 3 minutes to save my time. It also provides over 10 minutes of continuous spray time. A great helper!
customer_reviews.author: Summer16

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean
customer_reviews.text: Was amazing steam wash, not need hard work to scrub, I tried on my wash basin and the tap had water mark all went so clear without hard job.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Kumar Gubhaju

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Great price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works great. I literally cleaned my whole house with it. Base boards, mattress, carpet, sinks, windows exc.. Only hard part for me was pressing the unlock trigger and button to spray down at the same time. But after I figured it out it was easy. For the price this is a great little steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Crayon Wax remover champion
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this because my child left multiple crayons in the car in the South Carolina sun. Cup holder, carpet, seats it was a mess. The only thing I could think to do was to heat they back up and get them out. This did the trick. It melted all the wax removed all the color from the carpet. Five stars all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a steamer so I decided on this one and it is great! Cleans and works very well. The only thing that I don't care for is you have to hold down the button when you use it and that hurts my thumb and my hands. I wouldn't recommend to someone with arthritis or hands that don't work too well. Wish it had an automatic on button but otherwise great for a first time steamer!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it's easy to use and the instructions are very clear. I always wanted an steam cleaner and i did the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: mikehsia

customer_reviews.title: Good product! Amazing cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cleaner to help clean the soap scum off the shower door. It make easy! That’s great product!
customer_reviews.author: Wenbo H.

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish absolutely rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to clean a car seat and stroller it worked once after that the indicator light comes on and stays on but the unit doesn't heat up to produce steam. .. It didn't fall nor was it used incorrectly. ..it just stopped working after one use.
customer_reviews.author: kevin washington

customer_reviews.title: Does not lock like in description... water is not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this, was because of the following statement on the description "Lockable Steam Trigger Steam longer without holding the trigger, or simply use the trigger for on-demand steam." This is in fact false. It is a child safety lock, but it does not work as stated above.. there is no way to steam longer without holding the trigger. I have arthritis in my hands, so I have to return this. My husband also, could not get it to lock. I also want to note, that after heating a long time., the steam was not warm enough to kill any germs. I am very disappointed, and its already on its way back to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: BrynleahTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great potential, but poor design led to failure.
customer_reviews.text: I used this steamer 3 times and then it stopped working. The light still comes on, but it no longer heats the water. The attachments were hard to get on, yet easy to remove. The long extender wand didn’t attach at all. There is a warning to limit the angle of the steamer while using it. Any tilt beyond 45 degrees will likely harm the unit. This limitation makes using the unit cumbersome. When it did work, and with the attachments I did use, the results were impressive. I was able to get some stains out of my travertine tile that I thought were permanent.
customer_reviews.author: David Green

customer_reviews.title: Very light use cleaning only
customer_reviews.text: So far I am not too impressed with this steam cleaner. It works ok at best. The brush attachment is junk and became mashed up and pointless after the first use. I would say this is a very good cleaner for light use (did a good job on my windowsills), but no benefit to me for deeper cleaning of grout (a toothbrush works better and faster) or my tub/shower. I hope to find some good uses for this cleaner, but not working out for the harder jobs that I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Save you money and time, this item is small, useless and can not clean as well as they put on. You will be disappointed with the purchase trust me
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: It has been returned on Friday.  You will get it back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.text: It worked very well, however I did not have the strength in my arthritic hands to attach the accessories. I asked Amazon for product support (a video maybe of attaching accessories). I thought It might be something I was doing wrong. And they could not offer that so they suggested a replacement and I agreed to that. The replacement was easier or seemed to be, at any rate I was able to attach the accessories. I am pleased with it, and am cleaning everything in sight. Works great! My apologies for having had to return the first one but I need the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: C. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Top wouldn't come off after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty good at cleaning. Good pressure, nice and hot. But after one use I couldn't get the top back off. I even had my husband try and the top just kept spinning like it was completely stripped. So it has been sent back and I will be looking for a different handheld steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Rharrington

customer_reviews.title: This item is great especially in the time of the virus to help you clean everything in your house
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I’ve never felt that areas that I could not normally reach out as clean as they are for example the rubber around your washing machine and dryer I was able to steam this and get all that yuckiness away from the seals you can’t go wrong my only complaint is I wish it was a little bit bigger to hold more water because you have to let it completely cool down before you can reuse it and fill it but other Nat I love it
customer_reviews.author: caf

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bathroom Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I feel good after steaming the whole toilet. I add a few drops of lavender scent to the water. It also works well on plumbing fixtures and sinks. It's pretty strong so be careful using on stone. It heats up in about 4 minutes and runs for about 15 minutes which is plenty for 3 toilets.
customer_reviews.author: Ed OB

customer_reviews.title: Survey arrives too soon. Used only once.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as advertised, all parts included. Used it for the first time. Short nozzle was hard to attach. Locking pins would not engage. After trying for ten minutes and removing some "flashing" from the keyways, the nozzle fit perfectly. Unit worked well delivering a forceful stream of steam. These surveys arrive to soon after the products arrives. Slow down. Give people a chance to work with the things they purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur P

customer_reviews.title: there's no such thing as magic
customer_reviews.text: Not much to be said. Doesn't work effectively. Sure there are many life changing hacks and no exception to cleaning, but there's no such thing as magic and if you imagine some miracle product that takes the work out of work, forget it. That's about the only reasoning I can attribute to considering this as a cleaning tool... that somehow you will have less work or spend less time cleaning etc, (like I realize now that I was fantasizing about). I sent it back and doubt I'll be looking at steam products for anything other than ironing & such.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ferrier

customer_reviews.title: Very small with a very limited amount of steam.
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered to replace a previous hand steam cleaner that had seen best days. I am very disappointed in this steamer.....it is EXTREMELY SMALL and doesn't give out much steam at all. I'm debating whether or not to return this. I would suggest anyone who is looking for a good steamer that can put out a good-size stream NOT TO BUY this particular steamer. A big waste of money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had to give it low stars because it stopped working for me after about a month. I LOVED this thing, too. So I'm really sad about that. I used it pretty frequently, never used anything but distilled water, always drained all the steam out before putting away and today it just decided to stop working completely. When it did work it was great, though.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very well-constructed
customer_reviews.text: Okay let me be honest with you here maybe I just got a bad one I don't know that's probably what happened the unit was very well-constructed in heavy-duty but mine leaked water out of the top I did contact the company and they took the return and gave me a full refund it did not work for me this unit but it seem to be very well-constructed sometimes people get something that don't work and they give the product a bad review that is not fair I'm only stating my experience with this
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Everything Clean!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing and life changing. I have owned a few steamers in the past and nothing has worked like this! Now I no longer need chemical products in my home with my small child. I honestly cannot recommend it enough and have been Gifting it to my friends as they her birthday presents!
customer_reviews.author: Buffy

customer_reviews.title: Awsome, built well and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have found so many uses for this steamer. It is sturdy and extremely safe with all its features it offers. I just used it to melt ice that was built up between my refrigerator and freezer compartment, that was causing my refrigerator to not work properly. Ice is gone and the refrigerator works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gidget

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold a lot of water, so it needs frequent refilling...but it heats the water super quick so it's not a problem. Works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Kernaghan-Baez

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to use.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't able to check it over when first received and would have returned but I missed the deadline. The cap is very difficult to remove to add water. It was scuffed up (looked used) and a small piece is missing. Water does heat up fast. I'll keep trying it and hopefully will get use from it since I can't return. Hate that I didn't pay better attention to all the details!
customer_reviews.author: rhonda batt

customer_reviews.title: Look at this and other reviews
customer_reviews.text: why 1 star? After 4 uses LIKE MANY OTHERS. THE TOP OF THE STEAMER ABSOLUTELY WON'T COME OFF. AND, IF THE TOP WON'T COME OFF YA CAN'T USE IT. 4 DAYS AFTER THEIR WARRANTY RAN OUT!! IT'S UNUSABLE. I HAVE CONTACTED THE SELLER...AND.... NO ANSWER. BUT... I BOUGHT THE AMAZON EXTRA WARRANTY SO WE WILL SEE WHAT THEY SAY.
customer_reviews.author: Laverne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Works well but I think it would be better suited for steaming clothes and curtains, tried it on the sofa and it did an okay job but there was still a lot of scrubbing that had to be done.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: did not work as expected
customer_reviews.text: I used this to to clean the bathroom sink. My husband shaves and the small hairs are what I really got this for. I had to almost touch the tip of the nozzle on the sink for it to work. Directions say hold 2" away. This was not the case.
customer_reviews.author: MakeupandhairMuah

customer_reviews.title: No operation information was enclosed.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that no operation information was included in the package. I have not used the steamer, yet. Partially because I am not familiar with the steamer and do not know what type of fabrics it can be used with.
customer_reviews.author: Clarabell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for ligut duty cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: I like the features and attachments of this steamer. However it was no match on its own for cleaning grout on tile floor. I had to resort to a heavy duty cleaner and a grout brush. It might be good for the grout on the tiled wall but I will have to try that out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with it, until the hose attachment broke! I can still use it, but I miss the hose! It cleaned great though, I used it on windows, blinds, spot cleaned carpet & furniture. Definitely best for small jobs, as it doesn't hold much water, but it works! I need to get a new hose attachment!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Craig

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, ready quickly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, heats up quickly. I use it for everything from cleaning the sinks and bathtubs to steam sanitizing pet beds and toys. Multiple extensions make it very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kane

customer_reviews.title: Cleans in small crevices
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize I needed this in my life until I had it. It really gets out hard to clean stains - and uses steam to losen up grime. It's actually really helpful for pet owners and new parents.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Material quality looks highly durable as well.
customer_reviews.text: This steam cleaner is much better than the previous one i owned. I mainly ordered it for cleaning of stove and kitchen counters but later discovered that it can easily be used for so much more like cars cup holders, dashboards etc. This is so easy to use and doesnt require any cleaning detergent or chemical, just water cleans everything so good. Will highly recommend this product to someone who is big on cleaning and sanitization.
customer_reviews.author: Pilar Duran

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this item to help me detail a few cars at home, it worked perfectly. I decided to give it a shot on some stains on my couch and some dog stains on the carpets and this made them vanish. Great product, is easy to use and very Versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Craig

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: it shipped fast. It works really well. I got frustrated with the cap to fill it up, but after a few uses, I learned the trick. READ THE INSTRUCTIONS, lol when adding the water.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Just wished the cord was longer, the short cord made it kinda frustrating to use but over all I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Mofthrones

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏿
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 4 stars because it doesn't hold enough water. Get tired of filling that thing up.. Otherwise it works as intended
customer_reviews.author: Michael Solley

customer_reviews.title: Save time and effort
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is great and will save you a lot of time and effort. Recently, I heard from a friend that there is such a product. I always had a hard time cleaning the stove and range hood. Now I got this at a low price. I am very happy to have this item. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnita Jones

customer_reviews.title: Essential tool for de iceing.
customer_reviews.text: These are super handy items in my business for clearing iced up evaporators and clogged drains. I’ve bought many, and broken every one. Must use distilled water. No tap water. Thank you for the good price and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Poquette

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned the nooks and crannies just fine!!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I receieved it I went around half the house hitting the nooks and crannies!t's super fun to use and gives great satisfaction to cleaning nuts like myself.Overall I am really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ANNETTE BRYANT

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean stains off the interior roof of my car. Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This product should be a must for everyone that enjoys cleaning. I basically use every day at home.
customer_reviews.author: El chipi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It worked great as long as you hold it upright. I used it to steam my small carpet downstairs. After your ready to put more water in you have to let it sit a little bit after you make sure all the steam is out or you won’t be able to get the cap off it will just keep turning I would say maybe wait 10 minutes. Other than those two things it works great and is a great price.
customer_reviews.author: laura madrigal

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for cleaning in the kitchen with the hope of getting rid of the grease easily. This made cleaning easier. I'm also happy that this product can help get into some dead spots. The only thing is I wish there was a bigger one that could hold more water.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Good steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I write this review after receiving this product for 3 weeks and use it many times. I try to clean the carpet in my car because there are a lot of stains. I tried the stain remover before, but this time with the help of this product, the result is good. I also try to clean the stove, I really enjoy the result.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H. Froschauer

customer_reviews.title: great price. Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of box. Added sanitizers and. Have house and car. Clean. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tricky

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This steamer works perfectly. I needed a steamer with pressure to remove a guitar beck
customer_reviews.author: John R Moore

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: i feel that this would be a better product if it held more water. i was just experimenting with it.
customer_reviews.author: richard esch

customer_reviews.title: Faulty one
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t steam or clean well Others reviews say it works good. Maybe I just got a bad one
customer_reviews.author: Rafael vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great for sanitizing
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for cleaning the bathroom, around the sink, and toilets. It also does a great job in the kitchen on stove top and around the sink. This is powerful little steamer.
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: An okay product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The occasional spitting and spewing of water is aggravating but it’s an okay product Water doesn’t get as hot as the description said either.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwik86

customer_reviews.title: not ready to review yet.
customer_reviews.text: ask again in 2 weeks and I'll let you know. had to give stars for the answer to go through. not real rating.
customer_reviews.author: michael e.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful steamer
customer_reviews.text: This thing is powerful does slot better job then I expected thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dan     Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful! Terrific sanitizer and cleaner
customer_reviews.text: You can disinfect anything with this device without chemical. I highly recommend it. This is the third pressurized handheld steamer I have had and I use them enough to wear them out. The power is everything!
customer_reviews.author: CC2

customer_reviews.title: quality improvments
customer_reviews.text: The window rag that one puts over window cleaning attachment only lasted one use. The window cleaning attachment would work a lot better if the head swiveled or pivoted. On a more positive note it heated up quick and the heads I did use went on easily and stayed on
customer_reviews.author: James Lien

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great, 1 time! The second time we tried to use it, it blew steam out of all of the seams and couldn't be used...what a waste 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice and it broke. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work well at all. The steam pressure is terrible and only lasts seconds then you have to wait a long time for steam to build up and its done in seconds again. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: denise mitchell

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It's not what I thought. It does an ok job but if you need a deep clean this isnt it.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Carver

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to power steam the bottom of my shower and clean the grout in between the tiles. It wasn’t event powerful enough to remove soap scum on the side of the bathtub. Directions were difficult to read-mostly In Chinese and small print.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat it for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product detailing a car today! Worked great in the door jams and under the hood area. Also used it for a few stain removals on the carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Jeeper2010

customer_reviews.title: It did ok
customer_reviews.text: It did ok. Worked well on walls, but did hardly diddly squat on my oven. Runs out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Barry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very portable!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed and it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: cowgirlmama

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great little steamer, overall. It IS little, and the brush didn't stand up to the heat so the bristles bent on the first use but is still functional. Works great for smaller cleaning jobs and for getting wrinkles out of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lucas

customer_reviews.title: too low pressure
customer_reviews.text: the product creates steam however not enough pressure to dissipate the gook under the rim of the toilet bowl and other stuck on goo elsewhere. can't lock the handle to make it easier to work with constantly having to press the handle to keep it working
customer_reviews.author: robert hillenbach

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a friend. She's using it for wrinkles in clothing and drapes, bedbug control, and just general cleaning in kitchen and bathroom. She is extremely pleased with it and would recommend it to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for ice melting
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Helps me with my job when I need to melt ice without melting wires.
customer_reviews.author: David Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The steamer can get into the nooks and crannies to make it so much easier to clean and sanitize!
customer_reviews.author: KHolmes

customer_reviews.title: Major accessory failed
customer_reviews.text: About six weeks into using the steamer, the hose accessory failed. The durability severely limits its versatility
customer_reviews.author: fly1991

customer_reviews.title: wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this product. I bought it to use for cleaning, didnt clean a thing. The tank was way to small and i needed to keep filling it up. For me this was not worth what i paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: sherry baker

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Steam is not hot enough so can’t really clean anything. Now, it’s just sitting in my garage collect dust.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: The little steamer that could
customer_reviews.text: Product works as intended. Took all the salt stains from my vehicles carpet. Overall I'm happy with it. It's no professional deep clean but for such a small unit it does well.
customer_reviews.author: Scrammy

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s crap . It’s only steams for about 10 minutes and then you can’t use it or open it up until it cools down. I am very disappointed. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the values easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the values easy to use, not too easy to clean the tough spot.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: I will not be purchasing this brand again
customer_reviews.text: I have another steamer and it does not leak water all over when full and heating up also after only a short period of time the hose broke
customer_reviews.author: Randy Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Removed pets stains and other stains that I believed were permanent. I absolutely love this steamer and have recommended it to several friends and family members.
customer_reviews.author: wendy morgan

customer_reviews.title: Steam it all aeay
customer_reviews.text: It works amazingly well on tile grout. I’ve use so many different products to do the job but this is the one that goter done. I also use tjis for cleaning jewelry
customer_reviews.author: Joey Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash. Tested in the on the chair in the nursery and it worked. Thirty minutes later when we went to clean the love seat it wouldn’t turn on or heat. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Holmes

customer_reviews.title: It's average at best.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It's not as powerful as you'd need it to be. It's so so. To me it's not very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: The item cleans and leaves everything looking new
customer_reviews.text: The items is easy to handle and it really works great. I really do luv the item.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Inside gets dirty
customer_reviews.text: It builds up some white crystals when u don’t use it
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Comfortday cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Steam cleaner works fine. I used it to clean two printheads and both printheads work fine.
customer_reviews.author: ffnmpry

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love this little steamer, it works great, gets hot fast, and has a very good amount of steam that is produced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It getting my house clean sanitized
customer_reviews.text: That I got to keep holding the handle for the steam to come out that part sucks but other than that great product
customer_reviews.author: NETTAA

customer_reviews.title: Works great !
customer_reviews.text: Nice and has lots of attachments and it heats up quick and works very well
customer_reviews.author: Ayaan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it got some old car interior nice and clean!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Small tank
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt hold enough water. Always have to unplug let set then add water.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not good for tile or grout that is actually dirty.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for cleaning tile and grout. Works as well as a damp rag with some cleaner on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Follow the directions and it worked wonderfully!!!
customer_reviews.author: SunShyne_A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought a same product a few months earlier , it was $5 less
customer_reviews.author: Larry F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: The size is great it’s portable which makes it easy for day to day cleaning so I use it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I used to clean glue off cabnets that the installer leaked on them. Worked great
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Spit out more water than steam. Wasn’t that hot so more like a warm mist
customer_reviews.author: Cleavon Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Fill and go!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in order to help really get in the groove, nooks and crannies when cleaning. I used in my kitchen to help clean up leftover residue from my oven cleaner, cabinets, sink and wall area. Boy this thing has power. Easy to use. Just put on the attachment you need, Fill with water (be careful to not overfill, use the markers on the cup provided) and once the light is on you are good to go. Note: Once ALL the steam is released you can open the top and refill again. I'd recommend. Easy to use, powerful, compact and had alternate attachments included for other jobs like cleaning tile, windows, steaming clothes,etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: what a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: product doesn't work didn't try to use it until 2 days after the date i could return it. DO NOT BUY but if you do, try it right away so you can send it back
customer_reviews.author: Gloria DiZoglio

customer_reviews.title: Will peel the paint off of walls
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this to detail my car and steam clothes. The steamer works great at both of those jobs. Then, in the middle of struggling to remove old paint from some doors and baseboards, I decided to try this steamer. That paint is peeling off like the old Elmer's Glue came off your hands when we were kids. It's saving me so much time and aggravation!
customer_reviews.author: D. L. MCDONALD

customer_reviews.title: it does not perform as stated by seller
customer_reviews.text: Steam runs of pressure within seconds. waiting period is way too long before adding more water. pressure is not consistent. not happy with product. I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: tools

customer_reviews.title: Mean steam machine!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a difference! I first ordered a Bissell steam shot and that was a joke! This thing puts out copious amounts of steam. Sanitizing and cleaning are a breeze, this is the one that really packs a punch and with the 9 piece cleaning tools the versatility is incomparable. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Shano

customer_reviews.title: Great little steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I have a floor steamer. An upholstery steamer and a garment steamer. This one goes into all the smaller places the other ones can't reach. Great for the bathroom, kitchen, baseboards, pet crates, and air vents
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jane McCauley

product_meta.title: Comforday Handheld Pressurized Steam Cleaner- Multi Purpose Eco-Friendly Steamer with 9-Piece Accessories Steam Cleaning Machine for Stain Removal, Curtains, Car Seats,Floor,Window
feature_bullets: ★Nine free accessories: Tools adapt cleaner to every situation, including stairs, carpet, clothing, car interior and rims, etc. Gets into hard to reach areas.
★Multi-surface use: Works on every surface including laminate, hardwood, fabric, upholstery, wall paper, car, window, ceramic, linoleum, glass, marble and granite.
★Chemical free and safe: The Comforday steamer is completely nature and secured with a safety lock and safety cap.
★Powerful hot steam: Heat and pressure gets the job done faster. QUICKSTEAM technology offers 1050W of power; providing pressurized powerful hot steam (250-270F) for up to 15-20 minutes.
★Cuts through dirt: Tackle the biggest messes such as grout, grease and stains easily and quickly.
